subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Three of the four latest-finishing matches in the history of the tournament have occurred on Sept. 4, with the latest, between Mats Wilander and Mikael Pernfors in 1993, ending at 2:26 a.m.
snippet: Three of the four latest-finishing matches in the history of the tournament have occurred on Sept. 4, with the latest, between Mats Wilander and Mikael Pernfors in 1993, ending at 2:26 a.m.
